issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have been trying to run {{euca-bundle-vol}} on a ubuntu precise and fedora 22 host without any luck at all. 

Running following version:

{code}
$ euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.0-53-gbba3767 (Yokohama)
{code}

From github master branch as of today.

The error is almost the same on both the hosts:

{code}
# euca-bundle-vol -s 2048 -d /mnt -e /mnt -r x86_64 -P mbr --debug 
2015-06-30 10:24:45,245 DEBUG   BundleVolume parsed arguments: {'generate_fstab': False, 'kernel': None, 'all': False, 'fstab': None, 'part_size': 10485760, 'show_progress': False, 'prefix': None, 'ec2cert': None, 'exclude': ['/mnt'], 'size': 2048, 'productcodes': [], 'script': None, 'destination': '/mnt', 'grub_config': None, 'include': None, 'ramdisk': None, 'enc_key': None, 'enc_iv': None, 'volume': '/', 'user': None, 'arch': 'x86_64', 'block_device_mappings': None, 'partition': 'mbr', 'privatekey': None, 'inherit': False, 'no_filter': False, 'cert': None}
2015-06-30 10:24:45,249 INFO    Config finding global option default-region
2015-06-30 10:24:45,250 INFO    Config   novalue for default-region
2015-06-30 10:24:45,250 DEBUG   BundleImage certificate: /mnt/euca2-admin-06e5fd52-cert.pem
2015-06-30 10:24:45,250 DEBUG   BundleImage private key: /mnt/euca2-admin-06e5fd52-pk.pem
2015-06-30 10:24:45,251 DEBUG   BundleImage cloud certificate: /mnt/cloud-cert.pem
2015-06-30 10:24:45,251 DEBUG   BundleImage account ID: 819148903401
1+0 records in
1+0 records out
1048576 bytes (1.0 MB) copied, 0.00336165 s, 312 MB/s
Warning: The resulting partition is not properly aligned for best performance.
Model:  (file)
Disk /mnt/image: 4194304s
Sector size (logical/physical): 512B/512B
Partition Table: msdos

Number  Start  End       Size      Type     File system  Flags
 1      64s    4194303s  4194240s  primary               boot

2015-06-30 10:24:45,789 DEBUG   BundleVolume mapping partitioned image /mnt/image
euca-bundle-vol: error: No such file or directory
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/euca-bundle-vol", line 5, in <module>
    pkg_resources.run_script('euca2ools==3.2.0-53-gbba3767', 'euca-bundle-vol')
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 499, in run_script
    self.require(requires)[0].run_script(script_name, ns)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 1235, in run_script
    execfile(script_filename, namespace, namespace)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_53_gbba3767-py2.7.egg/EGG-INFO/scripts/euca-bundle-vol", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.bundle.bundlevolume.BundleVolume.run()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/requestbuilder-0.3.0_pre2-py2.7.egg/requestbuilder/command.py", line 305, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/requestbuilder-0.3.0_pre2-py2.7.egg/requestbuilder/command.py", line 302, in run
    result = cmd.main()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_53_gbba3767-py2.7.egg/euca2ools/commands/bundle/bundlevolume.py", line 169, in main
    device = self.__create_disk_image(image, self.args['size'])
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_53_gbba3767-py2.7.egg/euca2ools/commands/bundle/bundlevolume.py", line 301, in __create_disk_image
    mapped = self.__map_disk_image(image)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/euca2ools-3.2.0_53_gbba3767-py2.7.egg/euca2ools/commands/bundle/bundlevolume.py", line 312, in __map_disk_image
    stdout=subprocess.PIPE)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 679, in __init__
    errread, errwrite)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/subprocess.py", line 1249, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception
OSError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory
{code}

It would be really helpful to use {{euca-bundle-vol}} inside ubuntu precise and fedora 22 if at all possible.

PS: Other euca-* commands seems to work just fine so far.

Cheers,
Deependra
fields.summary: euca-bundle-vol does not work on Fedora and Ubuntu

comments.body: Silly me, was missing the {{kpartx}} package causing it to error out like this, had to open up the code and see what was it trying to do at that line number.
